title: First Steps with PTDB
body: This is the very first blog post to get you started with PTDB. Enjoy reading!
excerpt: Get started with PTDB in this introductory post.

title: Understanding MongoDB Schemas
body: Schemas define the structure of your data. This post explains how to use Mongoose schemas effectively.
excerpt: Learn the basics of MongoDB schema design using Mongoose.

title: Express and MongoDB Integration
body: Learn how to integrate MongoDB with your Express app for smooth and efficient data handling.
excerpt: Seamlessly connect Express apps with MongoDB using Mongoose.

title: Deploying Your App to AWS Lightsail
body: A step-by-step guide to deploy your Express and MongoDB app to AWS Lightsail.
excerpt: Deploy your full-stack app on AWS Lightsail with ease.
